revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contribs/CINEMATESINDIA|CINEMATESINDIA]] ([[User talk:CINEMATESINDIA|talk]]) to last version by CLCStudent
revision.text:
{{wiktionary|company}}
A '''[[company]]''' is a group of more than one persons to carry out an enterprise and so a form of business organization.
'''Company''' may also refer to: {{toc right}}
==Organizations== * [[Company (military unit)]], a group of soldiers * [[Opera company]], an instituted company that performs operas * [[Theatre company]], of touring actors, singers and/or dancers
==Arts, entertainment, and media== ===Literature=== * [[Company (novel)|''Company'' (novel)]], a 2006 novel by Max Barry * [[Company (short story)|"Company" (short story)]], a short story Samuel Beckett
===Music=== ====Groups==== * [[Company (band)]] * [[Company (free improvisation group)]], a jazz collective founded in 1968 ====Albums==== * [[Company (Bluejuice album)|''Company'' (Bluejuice album)]], (2011) * [[Company (Andy Burrows album)|''Company'' (Andy Burrows album)]] (2012) * [[Company (The Drink album)|''Company'' (The Drink album)]] (2014)
====Songs==== * [[Company (Broadway song)|"Company" (Broadway song)]], a song from Sondheim and Furth's musical ''Company'' * [[Company (Justin Bieber song)|"Company" (Justin Bieber song)]] (2015) * [[Company (Tinashe song)|"Company" (Tinashe song)]] (2016) * "Company", a song by Drake from ''[[If You're Reading This It's Too Late]]'' * "Company", a song by Third Eye Blind from ''[[Out of the Vein]]'' * Company, the subtitle of ''[[String Quartet No. 2 (Glass)|String Quartet No. 2]]'' by Philip Glass
===Periodicals=== * [[Company (LGBT magazine)|''Company'' (LGBT magazine)]], a magazine in Hungary * [[Company (magazine)|''Company'' (magazine)]], a magazine published in the United Kingdom
===Other uses in arts, entertainment, and media=== * [[Company (film)|''Company'' (film)]], a 2002 Hindi film by Ram Gopal Varma * [[Company (musical)|''Company'' (musical)]], a musical by Stephen Sondheim and George Furth
==See also== *''[[La Compagnie]]'' (DreamJet SAS) French airline *"[[Kompanie]]", Bonez MC and RAF Camora's 2018 rap song, from the album ''Palmen aus Plastik 2'' *[[Kompany (disambiguation)]] *[[The Company (disambiguation)]]
{{disambiguation}}
